Driven Before You.name: Driven Before You
Driven Before You.flavor: The savagery of your attack makes your enemies recoil.
Driven Before You.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push each enemy within 3 squares of you, other than the target, 1 square.

Blood-Soaked Fury.name: Blood-Soaked Fury
Blood-Soaked Fury.flavor: You pause, wipe th blood from your lips, and rush headlong back into the fight.
Blood-Soaked Fury.trigger: An enemy bloodies you with a melee attack
Blood-Soaked Fury.effect: Until the stance ends, you take a –2 penalty to all defenses, but you gain a +2 power bonus to melee attack rolls. Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, you regain hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Marked Savagery.name: Marked Savagery
Marked Savagery.flavor: Your vicious attack opens a gaping wound, and your focus on the enemy prevents him from tending to it.
Marked Savagery.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 15 damage (save ends). Until the target is not marked by you, it takes a –2 penalty to saving throws against the ongoing damage.
